config.handyshulkers.title: Handy Shulker Settings
config.handyshulkers.enableClickInsert.d: Right-click a shulker box on an item to insert it into the shulker.
config.handyshulkers.enableScrollExtract: Scroll over a shulker box to select and extract items from it.
config.handyshulkers.showFullnessBar.des: Show a progress bar indicating how full the shulker box is.
Tint tooltip borders to match the shulker box color.
config.handyshulkers.enableSounds.desc: Play sounds when inserting or extracting items from shulker boxes.
config.handyshulkers.soundVolume.desc: Volume multiplier for all Handy Shulker sounds.
Show compact tooltip by default. Hold Shift to toggle to grid mode.
config.handyshulkers.showItemName.desc: Display the selected item name above the tooltip.
config.handyshulkers.showItemCounts.desc: Show aggregated item count badges in compact mode.
config.handyshulkers.tooltipSize.desc: Size of the shulker box tooltip grid. Smaller sizes take up less screen space.
